Dr PietilÃ¤â€™s fingerprints can be found in all Axelâ€™s multistandard mobile TV products, and prior to his current position at Axel Technologies, Dr PietilÃ¤ has worked in a various technical and management positions, such as Production Manager and Senior System Architect.

Dr PietilÃ¤ holds a Doctor of Philosophy (Astronomy) degree from the University of Turku, Finland. He also has Master of Science degree in Theoretical Physics.
